```{r config, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.path = "fig/"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(devtools)
load_all("githubarchive")

library(dplyr)
data("activity")

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(activity, aes(x = created_at)) +
  geom_density(aes(color = type))
```
